Title: NETMESSAGE:We're on the way, but a military helicopter is approaching your position. You have to take it down to allow us to pick you up !
Translation: 我们已经在路上了，但是有一架军用直升机正在向你所在的方位靠近，你得先把他击落我们才能接你走！

Title:
NETMESSAGE:Hey, you're still alive ?

So you've saved most of the researches in the labs ?
Good, Our employer will be satisfied...
Translation:
嘿，你还活着吗？

实验室里的大部分科学家都被你救下来了？、
干得不错啊伙计，我们的雇主肯定会满意的...
